title: Namma Yatri Driver Partner
description:
Available in Bengaluru, Delhi, Hyderabad, Chennai, Kochi, Mysore & Tumkur. Namma Yatri Driver App is a community driven initiative that provides hassle-free auto & cab ride requests to the drivers. Built with insights & regular feedback from drivers, our goal is to enhance driver earnings while ensuring passengers experience joyous rides. Join us in revolutionising the ride hailing experience for autos & cabs!

Maximise Daily Earning Potential 

Namma Yatri is a Zero Commission app that helps increase daily driver earnings. Here’s how we do this:

✅ We charge ZERO commission. This means you don’t have to pay a cut of each ride. Drivers like you keep 100% of the ride fare shown to the customer. 
✅ All payment is made by the customer & goes directly to the driver once the trip is completed.
✅ Receive additional tips on the app from customers. Tip: Treat customers well to make more money.
✅ Namma Yatri is loved by over 2.2 lakh drivers and 46 lakh customers.
✅ We want to build a sustainable future for our drivers & vow to support their well-being with Driver welfare initiatives.

How does Namma Yatri work?

🛺 Install the Namma Yatri app
🛺 Register with your phone number with OTP
🛺 Upload your Driving License (DL) & Vehicle Registration document (RC)
🛺 Allow required permissions to the app so that we can show you ride requests
🛺 Start receiving ride requests from customers
🛺 Confirm requests and reach the pick-up location on time.
🛺 Collect OTP from the customer and start your ride.
🛺 Drop the customer off at their destination and collect your payment from them. 

Get to know more about us at https://www.nammayatri.in/
